definition: lit. warning to the following cart (idiom); don't follow the track of an overturned cart/fig. draw lesson from the failure of one's predecessor/learn from past mistake/once bitten twice shy
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
lit. the cart in front overturns, a warning to the following cart (idiom); fig. draw lesson from the failure of one's predecessor/learn from past mistake/once bitten twice shy
pinyin: qian2 che1 zhi1 fu4 , hou4 che1 zhi1 jian4
